descriptions.description: Lead a cross-functional team of 7. Championed MVP strategies that reduced AI feature time-to-market by 75%.
Orchestrated a critical 6-week technical rebrand and led the infrastructure migration to GitHub & Azure App Config.
Defined technical governance, standardized defect policies, and introduced peer-recognition systems to boost morale.
Owned FE architecture and finalized the internal component library (npm rollup) to standardize UI across the suite.
Primary FE representative in Agile ceremonies, ensuring accurate scoping and enforcing ticket readiness standards.
Managed performance reviews and facilitated professional growth for the Front End team.
Implemented a critical system update from Vue2 to Vue3 & TypeScript, resulting in an over 20% increase in application performance.
Built a reusable component library with Storybook documentation and established a Vitest testing culture achieving >85% coverage.
Developed the company’s first ‘JS only’ product: a client dashboard using a Vue3 UI and an Express.js/Sequelize API.
Played a lead role in the development of Mallcomm Front End, introducing structured workflows that improved plugin performance.
Introduced a structured format of work for the development team to increase productivity and accountability.
Key involvement in implementing multi-language translations across the Mallcomm product for 10+ languages.
Implemented responsive, accessible UI/UX designs across Drupal 7/8 sites for high-profile clients (e.g., National Forest, FCA).
Utilised BEM methodology to create well-structured, reusable Front End code, increasing development speed.
